title: KittenRemoteControl
Description_Short: Allows external access to the vehicle via a socket connection.
Description_Long: This mod allows you to get access to telemetry and vessel control via a socket connection. This is interesting, if you want to build your own 'cockpit hardware' or for external scripting. I'm working on a python wrapper in parrelel which is linked on the github page. On the github page you can also suggest features or report bugs.
author: GhentZ
